name: Eny and the Revenant
description:
Best played with a controller! Eny and the Revenant Controls:
  • Movement: Left stick / Keys A & D
  • Attack: Right bumper / Left Click
  • Roll: B button / Space
  • Sprint: B button / Shift
  • Aim sword: Right stick / Right mouse
  • Throw sword: Attack while aiming sword
  • Skip dialogue: A button / Space
